On the edge of Kew
Health & Wellness • Arts & Culture • New School • Shopping Destination • Lush Green Spaces • Tech-concierge • Curated Food Retailers

Only 6.5km from Melbourne CBD, YarraBend is a showcase of holistic innovation, creativity and cosmopolitan living, an exciting new community featuring premium homes, townhomes and apartments.

Welcome to the suburb of the future.

Surrounded by verdant parklands, YarraBend is a visionary, riverside suburb only 10 minutes from Melbourne CBD. With its unique combination of open spaces and cutting edge design, YarraBend is where new technology and old traditions meet.

Yarrabend will be Melbourne’s first future-proof neighbourhood to include Tesla Powerwalls in all residences, achieving the highest level of sustainability and quality of life.

Lush green spaces.

YarraBend is surrounded by Darebin Parklands and Yarra Bend Park, with views over endless canopies of native trees. Here you can lose yourself walking in the natural bushland or jogging past the area’s last remaining orchards.

Yarrabend will be the leafy green heart of the inner North East.”

Len Warson, Founder of Glenvill

Future focused.

YarraBend will be the first site to achieve a 6 out of 6 UDIA rating with a future-proofed neighbourhood.

Shopping destination.

With everything from major supermarkets to chic designer boutiques, YarraBend will cater to every need of its new and diverse community. Local fashion brands high-end labels, gift shops and florists will all create a village atmosphere in the heart of YarraBend.

Local knowledge.

As well as offering its own modern primary school, YarraBend puts you within easy reach of the highest concentration of well-regarded educational institutions in Australia, from kindergartens through to private school VCE.

Local flavour.

YarraBend will be a new Melbourne food destination known for its acclaimed chefs and on-trend dining sensations. A world of flavours and a variety of dining styles will be curated by an industry icon to create a new and excit

On the edge of Kew.

YarraBend is conveniently located only 450m from Alphington Railway Station, with platforms shaded by heritage listed trees Red Gums that pre-date European settlement. Fairfield Railway Station, adjacent to charming shopping village is also less than 15 minutes away by foot.

Arts & culture.

Art will be a major focus in the design of YarraBend, with an Art and Design Precinct that celebrates local and international artists through exhibitions, workshops and interactive pop-ups.

YarraBend is a lushly landscaped neighbourhood where residents can wander along paths that wind through lush parks and community gardens and across a spectacular highline.

With rooftop terraces, bike paths, playgrounds, riverside trails and three expansive gardens, this is a place to enjoy fresh air and time outdoors at your doorstep.

Along the streets and laneways of YarraBend, history and heritage will interweave with the latest technology. Here, a holistic lifestyle will be enhanced by the latest ideas in health and sustainability and a rich culture of art and craftsmanship.

Smartwired.

On the cutting edge of connectivity, YarraBend residents will belong to a Smartwired community with high-speed internet and a complimentary tech-concierge, a technical call-out service to assist with smart wiring or even WiFi home entertainment set ups.

A unique YarraBend app will also connect residents to a variety of amenities and information within the community, including public transport timetables, home delivery menus, carpooling arrangements and social events.

Health & Wellness.

YarraBend has been conceived as a peaceful place to live, away from the frenetic pace of city life. Nature can be experienced in all its delightful forms, whether on a riverside stroll or in the communal garden.

Bike paths meander throughout the precinct and connect right through to the city. Running tracks and the Highline trail connect a range of outdoor gym equipment. A wide range of sporting facilities encourages social games and an active lifestyle.

Exceptional connectivity.

Within YarraBend, walkways and bike paths enjoy priority over vehicular roads. Inspired by Scandinavian bike-friendly cities, YarraBend’s kerbless street design promotes greater safety and respect between pedestrians, cyclists and drivers.

YarraBend is only 450m from Alphington Station, shaded by heritage-listed Red Gums, with Fairfield Station less than 15 minutes away on foot. Buses commute directly to Queen Victoria Market and Melbourne University in the city, while those who drive have easy access to the Eastern Freeway across a new Chandler Highway bridge.

YarraBend will be home to a range of thoughtfully designed residences, from luxurious riverfront townhouses to contemporary apartments and studios.

Premium homes.

YarraBend offers a range of premium, architecturally designed residences to suit different needs. Choose from townhomes by the river, designer apartments or build your dream home with multi-zoned living areas, alfresco entertainment, stone benchtops and European appliances.

YarraBend residences are designed with 6-star sustainability features such as electric car charge points, energy efficient lighting, Solar PV energy and innovative Tesla Powerwalls

Local inspiration.

For over 50 years, Glenvill has been building luxury homes of extraordinary quality. Now, at YarraBend, this dedicated team is committed to creating timeless architecture that will combine the latest thinking in sustainability and design.

Glenvill

A Glenvill Group design is never ordinary. Defined by innovative ideas, seamless planning and supreme attention to detail. The Glenvill Group is a dynamic,multi-faceted company encompassing all aspects of design, development and construction.

Beyond this core business, the group also has divisions active in multi-unit housing developments, house and land packages, investment packages, project construction and interior design consultancy.
